page.title: 18A Wimbledon Umpire
page.content: My friend,Mrs.Guiltz,the Wimbledon umpire,began her career in Florida, where she lived.She started to play tennis with her six children and found she enjoyed it.She played on courts run by her friends husband,who was Chris Evert's father.One day he asked her to umpire a tournament,which she enjoyed. He suggested that she should join an umpire's association, so she took eye tests and written tests, and joined. She has umpired many other tournaments, such as the French Open, the Junior Davis Cup, the National Junior tournaments and the Virginia Slims tournament.Her favourites include Wimbledon and the French Open.Many people think hers a glamorous job but she says it is not very nice when it is cold and when you are standing or sitting still.
